name: The Lab (itch) (TinyGamesLab)
description:
Game done for the Godot Wild Jam 20 just to improve my godot skills on a platformed game (which is on of the bases for the full game I'm currently designing)

Play with keyboard and choose options with mouse.

Play it fullscreen for a better experience (button to toogle fullscreen/windowed mode on the top right).

All assets done by me except by the music, which is attributed to Rolemusic
